author: Rick Spilman
content: You are right. It is the oldest community occupied by Europeans.

author: Robert Kennedy
content:
please stop calling St Augustine the oldest continuously occupied city in the United States, it is not, by a long shot. Continuing to tell that hollow fact belittles all the Native civilizations from whom the land was stolen. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Acoma_Pueblo
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Taos_Pueblo
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oraibi,_Arizona
